IMAGE_UPLOAD_MESSAGE: Drop image or Select image here. Max width 800 pixel and height 448 pixel. Only PNG, JPG and GIF image types.
IMAGE_INVALID_MESSAGE: File is not an image type.
FILE_UPLOAD_MESSAGE: Drop file or Select file here.
FILE_INVALID_MESSAGE: File is not a document type.
MAX_FILE_SIZE_MESSAGE: File is an over maximum file size.
